Business Technical team members in analyzing the project requirements Worked on the sales and service clouds environment Customizing tabs for different business user groups and centers and customizing Used Tabular Summary Matrix and Joined reports to create standard and custom reports Defined lookup and masterdetail relationships on the objects and created junction objects to establish connectivity among objects Scheduling the reports dashboards for management and all the department heads by emails Used sandbox for testing and deployed the code into the production environment Worked closely with
